actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Parks, Preservation and Recreation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Historic Preservation and Recreation

official_title: A bill to provide for establishment of a memorial to sportsmen.

summary.text: Sportsmen's Memorial Act of 1998 - Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to permit the Sportsmen's Wildlife Foundation to establish in the District of Columbia or its environs a memorial to honor sportsmen. Prohibits the use of Federal funds in establishing the memorial.

titles.title: A bill to provide for establishment of a memorial to sportsmen.
